alert.note: Alert for Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:27AM EST until December 19 at 11:33AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Belknap and Grafton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Woodstock. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Route 175 floods to a depth of 2 to 4 feet from Cox Farm Road to Meadow Lane in Woodstock. Low lying areas along US route 3 also flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:46 AM EST Monday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 12.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
